interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: [Weekly Point Cosmetic Rose edition mask sheet] - Facial skin care mask sheet 3solutions(Wriklecare, Brighten up, Moisture) in one (1Pack of 10pcs) Review Date: 2020/02/02 Store: Weekly Point Cosmetic Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Weekly Point Cosmetic', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisture,Skin', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.38 x 4.84 x 7.01 inches; 12.63 Ounces'} Review Text: I’ve been using sheet masks for years. Long before they became something you could buy at your local pharmacy so I’m used to reading the adorable translations on the back (see photo)

That aside the mask is a little on the small side and I think I have an average sized face. It does stretch though and the benefit is that it doesn’t get in your hair. Lots of serum with this one, or mask juice as I like to call it
so at the end of the mask time you have enough to apply extra to your face a neck.

I left it for the full 20 minutes and my skin did feel soft and moisturised. I used it after a transatlantic flight and my skin really needed the hydration. Obviously you won’t see any miracles after one use but do make it part of your weekly or twice weekly routine for maximum effect.

Don’t be tempted to leave it on longer or sleep with it. All masks will just dry out and negate the benefits.

This is a nice addition to my sheet mask collection. Review Title: Lovely and hydrating. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare Enthusiast:** The user has a longstanding interest in sheet masks, indicating a commitment to skin care routines.
- **Hydration Focus:** Prioritizes products that offer moisture and hydration, especially after travel, reflecting a need for restorative skincare.
- **Routine-Oriented:** Incorporates masks into a regular weekly or bi-weekly regimen for optimal results, suggesting they value consistency in skincare.
- **Quality Over Quantity:** Displays patience for gradual results rather than expecting immediate miracles from a single use.
- **Sensory Preferences:** Enjoys pleasant scents (e.g., rose) and appreciates products that provide a sensory experience while caring for the skin.
- **User-Friendly Products:** Prefers items that are easy to use, particularly those that fit well without causing inconvenience (like not disturbing hair).
- **Value for Money:** Shows appreciation for products that deliver adequate serum, maximizing the benefits of each mask application.
- **Analytical Reviewer:** Engages thoughtfully in providing feedback, including product fit and performance, demonstrating analytical skills.

Overall, this user clearly favors effective, hydrating skincare solutions, particularly sheet masks, and has developed an organized approach to their skincare routine.
